testimonials.title: Companies That Trust Us
testimonials.subtitle: Discover how Technoagentes is transforming logistics

testimonial1.text: Technoagentes reduced our logistics costs by 30% and significantly improved the accuracy of our forecasts.
testimonial1.author: Maria González

testimonial2.text: The implementation was incredibly simple. In less than a week we were already seeing tangible results.
testimonial2.author: Carlos Ruiz

testimonial3.text: Technoagentes' AI agents allow us to make data-driven decisions in real time. Total game changer.
testimonial3.author: Ana Martin

feedo.name: Feedo
feedo.description: Specialized agent for data management and information feeding. Enables loading, processing, and structuring data so other agents can perform advanced analysis and generate precise insights.

forecaster.name: Forecaster
forecaster.description: Specialized agent for predictions and trend analysis. Uses advanced algorithms to generate accurate forecasts based on historical data and market patterns.

agents.simulatedResponse: Hello, I'm {agentName}. I received your message: "{message}". This is a simulated response.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to optimize your logistics

step1.title: Connect Your Data
step1.description: Feedo processes and structures your logistics information for advanced analysis.

step2.title: Analyze with AI
step2.description: Our specialized agents analyze patterns and generate precise insights.

step3.title: Optimize Operations
step3.description: Receive actionable recommendations to improve your logistics efficiency.

testimonial1.text: Technoagentes completely transformed our logistics management. Forecaster's insights helped us reduce costs by 30%.
testimonial1.author: Maria González

testimonial2.text: The ease of use of Feedo to load our data and get immediate analysis is impressive. I save hours every week.
testimonial2.author: Carlos Ruiz

testimonial3.text: The ROI has been exceptional. In 6 months we recovered the investment and continue optimizing our operations.
testimonial3.author: Ana Martín
